title: Diploma in Graphic Design
headline: Study the core concepts of graphic design and learn how to use professional design software in this free online course.
description: Do you have a passion for manipulating computer graphics? This online course gives you insight into the fundamental principles of graphic design. Using illustrations, we will explore the software that professionals in this field use, such as Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator and Adobe InDesign. You will be able to create various designs independently and understand how the numerous tools in each specified design program work.
courseDescription:
Do you have an eye for detail or an artistic side? Have you considered using these talents to create beautiful and eye-catching graphic artwork? We have designed this course to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of the core principles that are practical and applicable in the thriving industry of graphic design. Adams Academy, a company best known for offering accredited online courses on various subjects, has carefully curated this course taught by experienced professionals.

We begin by introducing you to the influence of colour in any artwork. You will discover the real 'magic' that you can accomplish in any design through colour manipulation. Next, we will introduce the most popular design software, including Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator and Adobe InDesign. We will explain the tools and menu items' functionality in each design propgram. We will use multiple examples and illustrations throughout the course to help you independently grasp and implement the concepts covered.

The following section focuses on the importance of a portfolio and what a good portfolio contains. Finally, we will demonstrate the process of designing simple and professional logos. We will explain a carefully sought-out strategy from idea conceptualisation to implementation and design presentation. This course will provide you with a rock-solid foundation to build on if you wish to adopt the creative journey of a graphics design artist and propel your career to the next level. Don't miss out on this opportunity to learn this exciting new skill. Enrol now!
